title: Raashi Haaram: Emerald and Polki Diamond Statement Necklace
materials: Faceted Emeralds. Diamonds are of VS clarity and I color.
features: A stunning three-strand haaram featuring a unique juxtaposition of modern design with traditional elements. Each strand alternates between bezel-set, oval-shaped Polki diamonds and intricately crafted emerald 'flower' clusters. The necklace culminates in a bold pendant featuring a larger polki set in a dual-halo setting. The Hyderabadi polish gives the gold a warm, rose-gold tone, enhancing the overall richness.
occasions: and grand festive occasions. Equally suitable for making a statement at high-end social gatherings or cocktail events. Will be a head-turner for a Seemantham (pregnancy ceremony)
description: This Raashi Haaram seamlessly blends traditional South Indian aesthetics with contemporary design sensibilities. The high-quality Polki diamonds and vibrant emeralds are meticulously hand-set, ensuring lasting brilliance and durability. The Hyderabadi polish guarantees a luxurious finish. Owning this piece is not just owning jewelry; it's owning a piece of art and culture.
